name: removeIssueTypesFromGlobalFieldConfigurationScheme
description:
Removes issue types from the field configuration scheme.

This operation can only modify field configuration schemes used in company-managed (classic) projects.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg).

id.description: The ID of the field configuration scheme.

body.description: The issue type IDs to remove.

$ul: **errorMessages**: The list of error messages produced by this operation. For example, "input parameter 'key' must be provided"

**errors**: The list of errors by parameter returned by the operation. For example,"projectKey": "Project keys must start with an uppercase letter, followed by one or more uppercase alphanumeric characters."
